item.title: Clemson SoC 101
item.author: contact@johnhollowell.com (John Hollowell)
item.description: Clemson’s School of Computing (SoC) is the place at Clemson where Computer Science (CPSC), Computer Information Systems (CIS), and Digital Production Arts (DPA) are located. Other computing departments (like Computer Engineering) also use some of the SoC’s systems. Below are some useful tips and tools for quickly getting going in the SoC. Access Servers The access servers are the way you can access all the SoC computers from off-campus (without having to use the VPN).
item.dc:creator: John Hollowell
item.category: Getting started in CS at Clemson
